title: Werecrocodile

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- On a full moon, attack one random visitor to your target
- On a New Moon, stalk a player, learning who they visit

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have detection immunity, but only on non-full moon nights
- You share a factional chat with other Were members
- Your new moon results are shared with the other Were members
**Hunting Moon Enhancement: Death Roll**
Your attack is upgraded to powerful, and you attack and clean your target as well.

desc:
Post 5275
_They eat babies in an C shape_
